examples.example: 中国正以昂扬的姿态屹立在世界的东方，展现着独特的魅力与风采。

translate.english: China is standing firmly in the east of the world with a high-spirited attitude, showing unique charm and elegance.

examples.example: 中国人民凭借着勤劳和智慧创造了辉煌的文明成果。

translate.english: The Chinese people have created brilliant achievements of civilization with diligence and wisdom.

examples.example: 中国在不断发展进步中为世界带来更多机遇与福祉。

translate.english: China brings more opportunities and well-being to the world in the continuous development and progress.
